title: Reuters
summary: Reuters (US: /ˈrɔɪdərz/ (listen), UK: /ˈrɔɪtəz/) is an international news organisation owned by Thomson Reuters.[1] It employs around 2,500 journalists and 600 photojournalists in about 200 locations worldwide.[2][3] Reuters is one of the largest news agencies in the world.[4][5]
